description: Try our easy to follow Prawn & Noodle Stir-Fry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prawn & Noodle Stir-Fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs salt-reduced soy sauce (plus extra to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Place snow peas in a large bowl. Place noodles on top. Pour over enough boiling water to cover and set aside.

Meanwhile, heat half the oil in a wok over high heat. Add ginger, spring onion and prawns and stir-fry for 1 minute until heated through. Add carrot and capsicum and cook, tossing frequently, for 2-3 minutes or until just tender. Toss in soy sauce and transfer to a large bowl.

Heat remaining oil in wok. Drain noodles and snow peas and add to wok. Toss for 2 minutes or until heated through. Return prawn mixture to wok and toss well to combine. Serve with coriander leaves, chilli sauce and extra soy sauce.
